snippet: Investors preferred financial stocks to technology stocks, and banks, including Citigroup and Bank of America, were among the best-performing stocks.
abstract: Stocks rise as investors are encouraged by signs of progress in budget talks in Washington.
lead_paragraph: Investors preferred financial stocks to technology stocks, and banks, including Citigroup and Bank of America, were among the best-performing stocks.

headline.seo: Shares Rise After Signs of Progress in Budget Talks
headline.main: Bank Shares Lead a Gain After Signs of Progress in the Budget Talks
headline.print_headline: Bank Shares Lead a Gain After Signs of Progress in the Budget Talks
